name: Dorn
appearance: Solid frame in oil-stained leathers, steady hands, and a nose permanently smudged with soot. Carries a pocket metronome that never lies.
character: Cautious and methodical master who counts failures as teachers and hates grand gambles.
talents: spots design flaws at a glance
keeps teams steady during partial collapses
flaws: lets caution be used as a cudgel
dreams: incremental improvements that save lives without headlines
own a modest workshop free of Ledger liens
keep every apprentice he trains alive to old age
stop the focusing ring from blinding the city
